create_table_sql.table: CREATE TABLE news_list (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, news_category_md5 TEXT, news_md5 TEXT, news_title TEXT, news_sub_title TEXT, news_source TEXT, news_url TEXT, news_src TEXT, news_note TEXT )

CREATE TABLE oauth_list (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT ,oauth_type INTEGER, oauth_note TEXT,oauth_user_id TEXT, oauth_user_nick TEXT, oauth_access_token TEXT,oauth_expires_in TEXT, oauth_expires_time TEXT )
CREATE TABLE city_list (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, city_code TEXT, city_name TEXT,city_pinyin_name TEXT, city_is_selected INTEGER, city_selected_count INTEGER DEFAULT(0) )

CREATE TABLE news_category_list (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, news_category_md5 TEXT, news_category_name VARCHAR(100),  news_category_note TEXT,news_category_url TEXT, news_category_order INTEGER, news_category_is_customed INTEGER DEFAULT (0) )
CREATE TABLE news_collect_list (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, news_id TEXT, news_title TEXT, news_source TEXT, news_detail_url TEXT, news_images_url TEXT )
CREATE TABLE hot_word_list (hot_word_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, hot_word_name TEXT, hot_word_add_date TEXT, hot_word_note TEXT,hot_word_load_type INTEGER DEFAULT(0) )
